result.arabic_text: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
result.translation: 76. Yalli isi naqoosak isi diinil tirri iyye marah Ion tirtot tirto keenih ossa, kaadu meqe taamoomiy abe numuh aracal Raqta is Nabiyow ku-Rabbih xaqul akeeral aysuk raqtaah gacim kee ellecabô maqaaneh aysuk raqta jannatal.
